bibdata.title: NetCDF Binary Encoding Extension Standard: NetCDF Classic and 64-bit Offset Format
NetCDF Binary Encoding Extension Standard: NetCDF Classic and 64-bit Offset Format
bibdata.abstract: This document defines an OGCÂ® Standard for encoding binary representations of space-time varying geo-referenced data. Specifically, this standard specifies the netCDF classic and 64-bit offset file binary encoding formats. This standard specifies a set of requirements that every netCDF classic or 64-bit offset binary encoding must fulfil.
